alert.note: Alert for Coastal Nueces; Coastal San Patricio; Inland Nueces; Inland San Patricio (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Corpus Christi (Corpus Cristi, Victoria and Laredo)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 09 at 12:17PM CDT by NWS Corpus Christi
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of central Nueces and southeastern San Patricio Counties through 1245 PM CDT... At 1216 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Corpus Christi North Beach, or near Portland, moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...Pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Corpus Christi, Portland, Ingleside, Gregory, Ingleside On The Bay and Corpus Christi North Beach. This includes the following highways... Interstate 37 between mile markers 2 and 10. US Highway 181 between mile markers 634 and 648. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...<30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. If on or near Nueces Bay and Corpus Christi Bay, get out of the water and move indoors or inside a vehicle. Remember, lightning can strike out to 10 miles from the parent thunderstorm. If you can hear thunder, you are close enough to be struck by lightning. Move to safe shelter now! Do not be caught on the water in a thunderstorm.

area.areaDesc: Coastal Nueces; Coastal San Patricio; Inland Nueces; Inland San Patricio
